original_text: So she gleaned in the field until even, and beat out that she had gleaned: and it was about an ephah of barley.
korean_text: 룻이 밭에서 저녁까지 줍고 그 주운 것을 떠니 보리가 한 에바쯤 되는지라

sentences.original_text: So she gleaned in the field until even
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그녀는 저녁까지 밭에서 이삭을 주웠다

sentences.original_text: and beat out that she had gleaned
and it was about an ephah of barley
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것은 약 한 에바의 보리였다
